#include <iostream>
#include <stdio.h>
#include <vector>

using namespace std;

int main() {
	
	int t, n, i, sum, val, j, carry, m;
	vector<int> A( 1000 );
	
	scanf("%d", &t );
	
	while( t-- ) {
		
		scanf("%d", &n );
		A.clear();
		
		m = 1;
		A[ 0 ] = 1;
		
		for( i = 1;i <= n;i++ ) {
		
			carry = 0;
			for( j = 0;j < m;j++ ) {
				
				val = ( A[ j ] * 2 ) + carry;
				A[ j ] = val % 10;
				carry = val / 10;
			}
			
			while( carry > 0 ) {
				
				A[ m++ ] = carry % 10;
				carry /= 10;
			}	
		}
		
		for( i = m - 1, sum = 0;i >= 0;i-- )
			sum += A[ i ];
		
		printf("%d\n", sum );
	
	}
	return 0;
}
